Place your PWA icons here. Recommended sizes: 96x96, 192x192, 256x256, 384x384, 512x512. Example filenames used by manifest:
- icon-96.png
- icon-192.png
- icon-256.png
- icon-384.png
- icon-512.png
- icon-maskable.png

Copy your designer files into this folder and resize/convert as needed. For example (PowerShell):

# copy the designer splash and icon into the project
cp "C:\Users\user\Downloads\Preview.png" "..\frontend\public\icons\icon-512.png"
cp "C:\Users\user\Downloads\1759003474211-sample.jpeg" "..\frontend\public\icons\icon-192.png"

Use an image tool (ImageMagick or an online service) to generate other sizes or make a maskable icon.
